item.title: Javascript: Bash for the Web
item.description: The world runs on the internet. From phones to servers, fridges to thermometers. The internet has invaded every part of our lives. The backbone of the world wide web that keeps everything running is… Javascript. One of - if not the - worst languages to be used in production systems. Why?
